title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.5 - Approval of special policemen
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4407.5 - Approval of special policemen

State Regulations

Each special policeman of a regional corporation other
than New York City, who is to have the status of a peace officer shall be
previously approved by the commission. Application for such approval shall be
made on the forms supplied by the commission. The term of such appointment
shall be set by the commission but may be terminated at any time prior thereto
by the commission. The commission may set conditions upon such
approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4407.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
